isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING PUMP: VICKERS (LUK) V10NF AND V20NF - INSTALL - SHAFT ROTATION

svcproc.title: SHAFT ROTATION
svcproc.para: Pumps are normally made for right-hand (clockwise) rotation as viewed from the shaft end. A pump made for left-hand rotation is identified by an "L" in the model code. Refer to Figure 2 and Figure 3.
The pump must be driven in the direction of the arrow cast on the pump ring. If it is necessary to change the direction of drive, it is necessary to reverse the cam ring ( Figure 13).

caution.para: Never drive a pump in the wrong direction of rotation. Seizure may result, necessitating extensive repair.

warning.para: Make sure vehicle's complete hydraulic system is drained, flushed and cleaned before installation of the rebuilt pump. Metallic debris of any type in the hydraulic system or fluid may destroy the pump, which may result in vehicle damage and/or personal injury.
